1. #### [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/AgendaCenter)

   Access easily searchable meeting agendas and minutes for various boards, commissions, and committees.
2. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/163/Boards-Commissions)

   Find more information about our boards such as meeting and member information.
3. #### [Departments](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/148/Departments)

   Learn how to contact our offices and officials and the duties or services of each department.
4. #### [Elected Officials](https://www.twp.woodbridge.nj.us/341/Elected-Officials)

   Woodbridge Township, with a population of 100,421, is New Jersey's fifth largest municipality.
